Enter_The_Name_Of_The_List: Enter the name of the list
List_Rules_Etc: Possible competition rules, purpose of the list, etc.
Bird_Already_In_List: Bird already added in this list
Create_List_Help:
• Normal creates a regular list where you add species as you see them.
  • Checklist is a list where you first specify which birds the list should contain and then you check each row when you see the species.
  • Birdstreak is a type of list where you choose a start and end date and 'lock' a species every other day (or another interval of choice) and try to keep the streak as long as possible. The ultimate challenge!
Observation_Already_Added: Observation already added to this Birdstreak list
Contact_The_List_Creator: Contact the list creator to invite friends.
Invite_Help_1: When you invite a friend to the list, Birdlist will send an invitation by email and also display a message here in the app.
Invite_Help_2: If the invitation is accepted, both of you will be able to add observations and comments to the list, but only you will be able to edit or delete the list.
Are_You_Sure_You_Want_To_Delete_This_Lis: Are you sure you want to delete this list?
Delete_The_Lists_Observations_As_Well: Delete the list‚Äôs observations as well?
Friends_Help: Here you can save the names and email addresses of your friends so you can invite them to your lists.

Write_Something_To_The_Others: Write something nice to the others on this list‚Ä¶
You_Have_Been_Invited_To_A_List: You have been invited to a list
You_Have_Been_Invited_To_The_List: You have been invited to the list
By_Using_Birdlist_Info: By using Birdlist, you agree that your email address is stored on your device as well as on your friends' devices, in case you share your lists with them.
You_Need_To_Login_First: You need to log in first to use this feature.
Have_You_Logged_In_Before: Have you logged in before but on another device?
Here_And_Now_To_Access_Your_Observations: here and now to access your previous observations.
Account_Help:
• When not logged in, you can create lists but not share them with friends. Your data stays on your current device only.
  • With a Trial account, your data syncs between devices for 30 days of usage and your lists (max 5) can be shared with your friends.
  • With a Premium account, all this keeps going after the 30 days evaluation period and you can create an unlimited number of lists.
Upgrade_To_Premium: Upgrade to a Premium account to create more lists.
